response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This unique offering holds significant value at $12,000 to me due to its exclusive features and the time invested in its development. Given your interest and the product's relevance to your needs, I believe it would be beneficial for both of us if we could reach an agreement. Considering its worth to you, I propose a fair price of $10,000. This allows you to acquire the product at a competitive rate while ensuring a reasonable return for my investment. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 10000}
